document.full_text: mass protests spread to the capital of syria for the first time on friday and looked closer than ever to driving out the leader of yemen, nearly four months since unrest erupted across the arab world.
document.title: syria protests reach capital, yemen leader seeks talks
lines_and_colors: mass protests spread to the capital of syria for the first time on friday and looked closer than ever to driving out the leader of yemen, nearly four months since unrest erupted across the arab world.
